text: Night is a memoir by Nobel Peace Prize-winning author Elie Wiesel. It was published in 1982 in Yiddish, French, and English. The story is about Wiesel's survival and struggle during the Holocaust. The soup consumed by Wiesel was described as "[tasting] of death" in a memorable quote. ==References== Category:1982 books Category:1955 books Category:1958 books Category:1960 books Category:Autobiographies
title: Night (book)
